lyrics:
33 contributorsbelieve lyricsintro
believe believe believe believe

verse 1
i dont know how i got here uh
i knew it wouldnt be easy
but your faith in me was so clear

prechorus
it didnt matter how many times i got knocked on the floor
you knew one day i would be standing tall
just look at me now

chorus
cause everything starts from something
but something would be nothing
nothing if your heart didnt dream with me
where would i be if you didnt believe
believe

verse 2
there were days when i was just broken
you know there were nights when i was doubting myself
but you kept my heart from folding

prechorus
it didnt matter how many times i got knocked on the floor
you knew one day i would be standing tall
just look at us now

but something would be nothing
nothing if your heart didnt dream with me
